## Introduction

```{r}
library("workflowr")
wflow_git_config(user.name = "name", user.email = "email@domain")
#create a directory for the project
wflow_start("GWAS_QC")
#build a website
wflow_build()
#view the site on the local machine
wflow_view()
#create a GitHub repository
wflow_use_github("name")
#in the GitHub repository, set up GitHub Pages in Settings
#to send the files to GitHub
wflow_git_push()
```
